subject: Order #SSN3179
description_text:
Bonjour,

J'ai bien reçu les kit pédalier.

Par contre , je n'ai pas reçu le frein à main, pourquoi ?

Le suivi de colis ne donne aucun résultat ???

--------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hello,

I received the pedal kit.

However, I didn't receive the handbrake. Why?

The tracking information isn't showing any results.
SF Express SF6047023888985 
<https://www.sf-express.com/we/ow/chn/en/waybill/waybill-detail/SF6047023888985>

Pierre

conversations.body_text: Hi Torkdul,    We apologize, the handbrake is currently out of stock. We will ship it to you tomorrow.
